summary: Added 3 tasks for P2P migration from legacy-nodes to node-core: T042 (P2P core migration), T043 (GossipSub migration), T044 (legacy-nodes deprecation)

T042.title: Migrate P2P Core Implementation from legacy-nodes to node-core

T043.title: Migrate GossipSub, Reputation Oracle, and P2P Metrics to node-core

T044.title: Deprecate and Remove legacy-nodes After P2P Migration

details.critical_path_impact: Added T042 → T043 → T044 to critical path after T022
